thread.title: Magro Brothers' product wins award in Dubai
thread.title_full: Magro Brothers' product wins award in Dubai

title: Magro Brothers' product wins award in Dubai
text:
Monday, February 27, 2017, 11:25 Magro Brothers' product wins award in Dubai Magro Brothers' representative accepting the award. 
A product produced by Magro Brothers has won an award at the Gulfood Innovation Awards in Dubai. 
Pinto's Pride Spoon Stock won the Best Condiment or Sauce category at the awards, which form part of the Gulfood Exhibition. 
Gulfood is the world's largest annual food and beverage exhibition, welcoming professionals from all over of the globe to meet for five days of business. Over 4,000 exhibitors took part this year. 
The Maltese product was shortlisted among several other contestants and placed among the best three products together with a Portuguese Rose Vinegar and a Mediterranean Vegetable Relish. 
Spoon Stock is one of the latest innovations created by Magro Brothers, a liquid bouillon concentrate. It is fat-free and has 40 per cent less salt than traditional stock cubes found on the market.
